info: The Project is located in Anhui Province and is designed to promote inclusive growth and balanced development, and improve resource efficiency and environmental sustainability. The Project will contribute to an integrated road transport system in Anhui by (i) constructing a 139-kilometer (km) expressway and associated facilities between Xuzhou and Mingguang; (ii) upgrading, rehabilitating, and providing safety measures on 452 km of existing local roads; (iii) improving village bus services in poorer areas; and (iv) providing institutional strengthening and capacity building for the Anhui Provincial Department of Transport (APDOT), its related agencies, and Anhui Communications Investment Group Company Limited (ACIG).
name: ANHUI INTEGRATED TRANSPORT SECTOR IMPROVEMENT PROJECT
